title: design Podcast - what do you listen too?
content:
Am looking at building up a bit more of a library of design related podcasts, hmm well I only actually have one on the list at the moment but wanted to ask what other designers out there listening too.

Looking for both web and print related design
author: Monsta

comments.content:
[www.36point.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516052701/http:/www.36point.com/ "www.36point.com")

I listen to their podcast mostly due to the fact I know who they are and often have designers on from where I'm located, Omaha.

Design Observer should do a podcast, that would make me happy.

I'm definitely now going to give Typeradio a listen for the first time.
I second 36point.com, Krebstar. I've never been anywhere near Omaha, but I've listened to these guys' great shows since the very first Be A Design Cast, their old show.
I was going to mention Be A Design Cast/Group, but I figured since it's gone it wasn't worth it. I miss that blog being updated.

I listen to "What These Bitches Want" by rapper artist DMX from successful album of 2007 "The Definition of X: The Pick of the Litter". There is many inspiration in this aggressive lyrics. Strong for type design work.

I think the SVA has an excellent series of podcasts/vidcasts for you to download.

[Clicky for the linky](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516052701/http:/design.schoolofvisualarts.edu/weblog/)
